text.author: Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia
text.title: Theodorus of Tabennese
text.summary: Theodorus of Tabennese, also known as Abba Theodorus and Theodore the Sanctified was a 4th Century Christian monastic leader at the monastery in Tabennese, Egypt, who became the spiritual successor to the previous leader, Pachomius, and played a crucial role in preventing the first Christian cenobitic monastic federation from collapsing after his death.
